This movie was solid! And let me say to whomever said these actors were at the end of there career; Bullshit!
Adam Sandler; Funny people with Seth Rogan, a great film.
Kevin James; King of Queens, one of the best up-to-date sitcoms out there right now.
Chris Rock; I literally just watched Death at a Funeral before this, and it's definitely worth watching. As well as Everybody Hates Chris, another great sitcom!
David Spade; He may not have been doing much up to date, but Grandmas boy, Benchwarmers and the Rules of Engagement. Enough said.
Rob Schneider; You don't mess with the zohan was good enough. He plays the wierdo kind of scenarios more then well.
